analysis:
From last week (2025-08-04 to 2025-08-10) to today (2025-08-12), the sentiment for HSBC has fluctuated. Last week included positive sentiment regarding HSBC being a "Buy the Bottom" stock and recognition of its US Head of Wealth and Private Banking on a Forbes list. There was also a neutral report on the sale of a private credit stake and a report on Q2 earnings for Intercorp Financial Services. A negative factor was HSBC's decision to shut down its retail operation in Bangladesh.

Today, there is no news available.

Sentiment Outlook: Neutral

HSBC,2025-08-12,0.00,0.00,0.00,neutral
